title: Show Activity 1 & 2 feedback on Leadership Board immediately (no manual refresh)

requirements.text: Make the Leadership Board update automatically while the page is open so new Activity 1 (leadership word) and Activity 2 (micro-solution) submissions appear without the user manually refreshing the browser.

quotes:
Post feedback from activity 1 and 2 to leadership board simultaneously as it is given to the user.

So the feedback is shown on leadership board without having to refresh page

acceptanceCriteria: When the Leadership Board page is left open, it periodically refetches both leadership word counts and community solutions so newly submitted data appears without a full page reload.
The refresh mechanism does not require WebSockets or other real-time services; it works using client-side polling/refetch behavior.
The polling interval is reasonable (e.g., a few seconds) and does not cause visible UI flicker during background updates.

requirements.text: After a successful Activity 1 submission, update the cached Leadership Word counts immediately so any mounted Leadership Board/summary views reflect the new word count right away (in the same SPA session), without waiting for the next refetch.

quotes: Post feedback from activity 1 and 2 to leadership board simultaneously as it is given to the user.

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting Activity 1 causes the leadership word counts UI (wherever currently mounted) to update immediately after the submission succeeds.
The cached update correctly increments the submitted wordâ€™s count (or adds it if it does not exist yet).
The existing invalidation behavior is preserved so the cache will still reconcile with the backend on subsequent refetches.

requirements.text: After a successful Activity 2 submission, update the cached Community Solutions list immediately so any mounted Leadership Board/solutions views reflect the new micro-solution right away (in the same SPA session), without waiting for the next refetch.

quotes: Post feedback from activity 1 and 2 to leadership board simultaneously as it is given to the user.

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting Activity 2 causes the community solutions UI (wherever currently mounted) to include the new submission immediately after the submission succeeds.
The cached update includes the submitted fields needed by the list rendering (challenge type/custom challenge, microSolution, protectiveFactor).
The existing invalidation behavior is preserved so the cache will still reconcile with the backend on subsequent refetches.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Respect the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Implementing true push-based real-time updates (e.g., WebSockets, server-sent events).
Changing backend data models or adding new backend endpoints unless strictly required for the UI refresh behavior.
